verses.verse: וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <WH428> now these תּוֹלְדֹ֣ת <WH8435> Now these [are] the generations בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons נֹ֔חַ <WH5146> of Noah שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> Shem חָ֣ם <WH2526> Ham וָיָ֑פֶת <WH3315> and Japheth וַיִּוָּלְד֥וּ <WH3205> born לָהֶ֛ם בָּנִ֖ים <WH1121> and unto them were sons אַחַ֥ר <WH310> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <WH3999> the flood

בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> The sons יֶ֔פֶת <WH3315> of Japheth גֹּ֣מֶר <WH1586> Gomer וּמָג֔וֹג <WH4031> and Magog וּמָדַ֖י <WH4074> and Madai וְיָוָ֣ן <WH3120> and Javan וְתֻבָ֑ל <WH8422> and Tubal וּמֶ֖שֶׁךְ <WH4902> and Meshech וְתִירָֽס׃ <WH8494> and Tiras
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons גֹּ֑מֶר <WH1586> of Gomer אַשְׁכֲּנַ֥ז <WH813> Ashkenaz וְרִיפַ֖ת <WH7384> and Riphath וְתֹגַרְמָֽה׃ <WH8425> and Togarmah
וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> And the sons יָוָ֖ן <WH3120> of Javan אֱלִישָׁ֣ה <WH473> Elishah וְתַרְשִׁ֑ישׁ <WH8659> and Tarshish כִּתִּ֖ים <WH3794> Kittim וְדֹדָנִֽים׃ <WH1721> and Dodanim

מֵ֠אֵלֶּה <WH428> these נִפְרְד֞וּ <WH6504> divided in אִיֵּ֤י <WH339> By these were the isles הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> of the Gentiles בְּאַרְצֹתָ֔ם <WH776> their lands אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> every one לִלְשֹׁנ֑וֹ <WH3956> after his tongue לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1471> in their nations
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the sons חָ֑ם <WH2526> of Ham כּ֥וּשׁ <WH3568> Cush וּמִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> and Mizraim וּפ֥וּט <WH6316> and Phut וּכְנָֽעַן׃ <WH3667> and Canaan

וּבְנֵ֣י <WH1121> And the sons כ֔וּשׁ <WH3568> of Cush סְבָא֙ <WH5434> Seba וַֽחֲוִילָ֔ה <WH2341> and Havilah וְסַבְתָּ֥ה <WH5454> and Sabtah וְרַעְמָ֖ה <WH7484> and Raamah וְסַבְתְּכָ֑א <WH5455> and Sabtecha וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> and the sons רַעְמָ֖ה <WH7484> of Raamah שְׁבָ֥א <WH7614> Sheba וּדְדָֽן׃ <WH1719> and Dedan

וְכ֖וּשׁ <WH3568> And Cush יָלַ֣ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> נִמְרֹ֑ד <WH5248> Nimrod ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הֵחֵ֔ל <WH2490> he began לִֽהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> to be גִּבֹּ֖ר <WH1368> a mighty one בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> in the earth

הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> become גִבֹּֽר־ <WH1368> He was a mighty צַ֖יִד <WH6718> hunter לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּן֙ <WH3651> wherefore יֵֽאָמַ֔ר <WH559> it is said כְּנִמְרֹ֛ד <WH5248> Even as Nimrod גִּבּ֥וֹר <WH1368> the mighty צַ֖יִד <WH6718> hunter לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַתְּהִ֨י <WH1961> become רֵאשִׁ֤ית <WH7225> And the beginning מַמְלַכְתּוֹ֙ <WH4467> of his kingdom בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> was Babel וְאֶ֖רֶךְ <WH751> and Erech וְאַכַּ֣ד <WH390> and Accad וְכַלְנֵ֑ה <WH3641> and Calneh בְּאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the land שִׁנְעָֽר׃ <WH8152> of Shinar

מִן־ <WH4480> that הָאָ֥רֶץ <WH776> Out of that land הַהִ֖וא <WH1931> he יָצָ֣א <WH3318> went forth אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> Asshur וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <WH1129> and builded אֶת־ <WH853> נִ֣ינְוֵ֔ה <WH5210> Nineveh וְאֶת־ <WH853> רְחֹבֹ֥ת <WH7344> Rehoboth עִ֖יר <WH5892> and the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּֽלַח׃ <WH3625> and Calah

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> רֶ֔סֶן <WH7449> And Resen בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between נִֽינְוֵ֖ה <WH5210> between Nineveh וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between כָּ֑לַח <WH3625> and Calah הִ֖וא <WH1931> he הָעִ֥יר <WH5892> city הַגְּדֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> the same [is] a great

וּמִצְרַ֡יִם <WH4714> And Mizraim יָלַ֞ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> לוּדִ֧ים <WH3866> Ludim וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲנָמִ֛ים <WH6047> and Anamim וְאֶת־ <WH853> לְהָבִ֖ים <WH3853> and Lehabim וְאֶת־ <WH853> נַפְתֻּחִֽים׃ <WH5320> and Naphtuhim

וְֽאֶת־ <WH853> פַּתְרֻסִ֞ים <WH6625> And Pathrusim וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּסְלֻחִ֗ים <WH3695> and Casluhim אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which יָצְא֥וּ <WH3318> (out of whom came מִשָּׁ֛ם <WH8033> in it פְּלִשְׁתִּ֖ים <WH6430> Philistine וְאֶת־ <WH853> כַּפְתֹּרִֽים׃ <WH3732> Caphthorim ס
וּכְנַ֗עַן <WH3667> And Canaan יָלַ֛ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> צִידֹ֥ן <WH6721> Sidon בְּכֹר֖וֹ <WH1060> his firstborn וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֵֽת׃ <WH2845> and Heth
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַיְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> And the Jebusite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣אֱמֹרִ֔י <WH567> and the Amorite וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> הַגִּרְגָּשִֽׁי׃ <WH1622> and the Girgasite
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחִוִּ֥י <WH2340> And the Hivite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽעַרְקִ֖י <WH6208> and the Arkite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַסִּינִֽי׃ <WH5513> and the Sinite

וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַרְוָדִ֥י <WH721> And the Arvadite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַצְּמָרִ֖י <WH6786> and the Zemarite וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֲמָתִ֑י <WH2577> and the Hamathite וְאַחַ֣ר <WH310> and afterward נָפֹ֔צוּ <WH6327> spread abroad מִשְׁפְּח֖וֹת <WH4940> were the families הַֽכְּנַעֲנִֽי׃ <WH3669> of the Canaanites

וַֽיְהִ֞י <WH1961> extended גְּב֤וּל <WH1366> And the border הַֽכְּנַעֲנִי֙ <WH3669> of the Canaanites מִצִּידֹ֔ן <WH6721> was from Sidon בֹּאֲכָ֥ה <WH935> as thou comest גְרָ֖רָה <WH1642> to Gerar עַד־ <WH5704> far עַזָּ֑ה <WH5804> unto Gaza בֹּאֲכָ֞ה <WH935> as thou goest סְדֹ֧מָה <WH5467> unto Sodom וַעֲמֹרָ֛ה <WH6017> and Gomorrah וְאַדְמָ֥ה <WH126> and Admah וּצְבֹיִ֖ם <WH6636> and Zeboim עַד־ <WH5704> far לָֽשַׁע׃ <WH3962> even unto Lasha

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons חָ֔ם <WH2526> of Ham לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לִלְשֹֽׁנֹתָ֑ם <WH3956> after their tongues בְּאַרְצֹתָ֖ם <WH776> in their countries בְּגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1471> [and] in their nations ס

וּלְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8035> Unto Shem יֻלַּ֖ד <WH3205> even to him were [children] born גַּם־ <WH1571> Also ה֑וּא <WH1931> he אֲבִי֙ <WH1> also the father כָּל־ <WH3605> of all בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of all the children עֵ֔בֶר <WH5677> of Eber אֲחִ֖י <WH251> the brother יֶ֥פֶת <WH3315> of Japheth הַגָּדֽוֹל׃ <WH1419> the elder
בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> The children שֵׁ֖ם <WH8035> of Shem עֵילָ֣ם <WH5867> Elam וְאַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> and Asshur וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <WH775> and Arphaxad וְל֥וּד <WH3865> and Lud וַֽאֲרָֽם׃ <WH758> and Aram
וּבְנֵ֖י <WH1121> And the children אֲרָ֑ם <WH758> of Aram ע֥וּץ <WH5780> Uz וְח֖וּל <WH2343> and Hul וְגֶ֥תֶר <WH1666> and Gether וָמַֽשׁ׃ <WH4851> and Mash
וְאַרְפַּכְשַׁ֖ד <WH775> And Arphaxad יָלַ֣ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> שָׁ֑לַח <WH7974> Salah וְשֶׁ֖לַח <WH7974> and Salah יָלַ֥ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> עֵֽבֶר׃ <WH5677> Eber

וּלְעֵ֥בֶר <WH5677> And unto Eber יֻלַּ֖ד <WH3205> were born שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two בָנִ֑ים <WH1121> sons שֵׁ֣ם <WH8034> the name הָֽאֶחָ֞ד <WH259> of one פֶּ֗לֶג <WH6389> [was] Peleg כִּ֤י <WH3588> in בְיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> for in his days נִפְלְגָ֣ה <WH6385> divided הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> was the earth וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> name אָחִ֖יו <WH251> and his brother's יָקְטָֽן׃ <WH3355> [was] Joktan

וְיָקְטָ֣ן <WH3355> And Joktan יָלַ֔ד <WH3205> begat אֶת־ <WH853> אַלְמוֹדָ֖ד <WH486> Almodad וְאֶת־ <WH853> שָׁ֑לֶף <WH8026> and Sheleph וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲצַרְמָ֖וֶת <WH2700> and Hazarmaveth וְאֶת־ <WH853> יָֽרַח׃ <WH3392> and Jerah
וְאֶת־ <WH853> הֲדוֹרָ֥ם <WH1913> And Hadoram וְאֶת־ <WH853> אוּזָ֖ל <WH187> and Uzal וְאֶת־ <WH853> דִּקְלָֽה׃ <WH1853> and Diklah
וְאֶת־ <WH853> עוֹבָ֥ל <WH5745> And Obal וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֲבִֽימָאֵ֖ל <WH39> and Abimael וְאֶת־ <WH853> שְׁבָֽא׃ <WH7614> and Sheba

וְאֶת־ <WH853> אוֹפִ֥ר <WH211> And Ophir וְאֶת־ <WH853> חֲוִילָ֖ה <WH2341> and Havilah וְאֶת־ <WH853> יוֹבָ֑ב <WH3103> and Jobab כָּל־ <WH3605> all אֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> all these [were] the sons יָקְטָֽן׃ <WH3355> of Joktan

וַֽיְהִ֥י <WH1961> extended מוֹשָׁבָ֖ם <WH4186> And their dwelling מִמֵּשָׁ֑א <WH4852> was from Mesha בֹּאֲכָ֥ה <WH935> as thou goest סְפָ֖רָה <WH5611> unto Sephar הַ֥ר <WH2022> a mount הַקֶּֽדֶם׃ <WH6924> of the east

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These בְנֵי־ <WH1121> These [are] the sons שֵׁ֔ם <WH8035> of Shem לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <WH4940> after their families לִלְשֹׁנֹתָ֑ם <WH3956> after their tongues בְּאַרְצֹתָ֖ם <WH776> in their lands לְגוֹיֵהֶֽם׃ <WH1471> after their nations

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These מִשְׁפְּחֹ֧ת <WH4940> These [are] the families בְּנֵי־ <WH1121> of the sons נֹ֛חַ <WH5146> of Noah לְתוֹלְדֹתָ֖ם <WH8435> after their generations בְּגוֹיֵהֶ֑ם <WH1471> in their nations וּמֵאֵ֜לֶּה <WH428> of these נִפְרְד֧וּ <WH6504> divided הַגּוֹיִ֛ם <WH1471> and by these were the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> in the earth אַחַ֥ר <WH310> after הַמַּבּֽוּל׃ <WH3999> the flood פ
